body.p: The publishing connectors page allows you to create and configure connectors. A Content Fusion connector allows you to associate it with a deliverable, enabling the publishing for the Deliverable build outputs through the configured connector. Content Fusion offers support for the following connector types:

To initiate the creation of a new connector, simply click the "New Connector" button located in the top-right corner of the page. From there, select the desired connector type. A dialog window will promptly appear, prompting you to fill in the necessary fields corresponding to the chosen connector type.

For existing connectors, you can perform various actions such as editing, deleting, and viewing linked deliverables. Simply click on the right-hand side icon for the respective connector and choose the desired action from the dropdown menu.
